content: I've owned the PC version of this game since the early 2000s. My only criticism with this version is the inability to remove the displaying of pencil marks. That feature is called "Erase All" in the PC version. If that were available I would give give stars.
replyContent: Great suggestion! Will look into adding that feature in the next release!

content: I want to love it, this is exactly what I wanted to practice different techniques. But the interface is just.... Bad... Too many steps to add a number. Ideally let us select the number first and place it with 1 click after that. Also a bit hard on the eyes compared to other sudoku apps (the good ones without ads, that is).
replyContent: Dear User, thanks very much for your feedback. We will definitely be taking suggestions like this into account as we enhance the interface in the future!
